name: forecast-research
description: A comprehensive research plugin for domain-specific internet exploration, content aggregation, and daily forecasting summaries. Automatically discovers and tracks relevant articles, news, and content across configurable domains.
author: Strye

commands.name: forecast.research
commands.description: Initiate a domain-specific research session to discover and collect relevant content

commands.name: forecast.config
commands.description: Configure research domains, sources, and storage settings

commands.name: forecast.status
commands.description: Check the status of research activities and content collection

agents.name: research-agent
agents.description: Autonomous agent that explores the internet for domain-specific content and manages deduplication

agents.name: summary-agent
agents.description: Creates daily summaries from collected research content across domains

skills.name: content-fetcher
skills.description: Fetches and validates web content for research

skills.name: dedup-manager
